column5: Once again, this event is schedualed for April 18th, One week before opening weekend when the fish will be on the redds..........awesome
I thought it was illigal to disturb spawning fish in any way...?   We have a canoe race every year here that goes over walleye spawning beds in a local trib to the st lawrence...
The guy that runs the fish ladder is furious, especially since he was told by the town last year that they wouldn't run it that late again  dollar signs before natural resources......

Yes Bill a Brilliant idea  with some "boaters" 'soaked' with adult beverages causing havoc on the river.  It was mentioned  as an event  a while back, they may have backed off ; well I haven't seen  it in my copy for a while.
